Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Maximize Feature Completion
Description: Complete as many features as possible within budget

Name: Minimize Sprint Overrun
Description: Keep sprint duration within planned dates

Name: Maximize Skill Match
Description: Assign tasks to employees with matching skills

Name: Minimize Unplanned Work
Description: Reduce unplanned tasks or bugs introduced during sprints

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Ensure high attendance and feedback quality in Sprint Reviews
